euporia.tecnling.retoricaweb.database

Class DatabaseDAOModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • euporia.tecnling.retoricaweb.database.DatabaseDAOModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentDAO, UserDAO

    public class DatabaseDAOModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Db modeling. It has to be extended for every model in this package. It deals with a single object from the collection, per instance.

    WARNING: Every subclass that can be read MUST "override" the Readable static methods
